subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|手|t1=扌|包|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – hold in one’s hands. Note that 包 has the meaning of “wrap”, hence connotations of “wrap in one’s hands, embrace”.

|mn_note=phǒ͘/phō - literary; phǒ/phǎu/phāu/pǎu/pāu - vernacular; pō - unknown dialect{{attention|nan}}
